resolvedstellarpops.plotting module¶

Module contents¶

From Phil’s repo: ResolvedStellarPops This is a repo of codes used for my own projects, it’s not that portable (yet), filenames are hardcoded, and lots can change.

First crack at porting version and at cleaning internal recipes
